tweet: Welcomed members of the @NCelectriccoop to my DC office today to talk about infrastructure, rural broadband and other needs facing #NC07's rural communities. pic.twitter.com/mWfdHl8YvC

Yesterday, I spoke on the House floor in recognition of Mr. Carl Lamm who retired after 72 years on the golden airwaves as America’s longest continuous radio broadcaster. As he enters this new chapter, may God continue to bless his path. #NC07 pic.twitter.com/3J1bvrCXxo
